name: LESS is MORT
description:
Welcome to our BlackThornProd Jam 3 "Less is More" submission.

/!\ Disclaimer: We did not create the sounds for this game /!\

Create your character and fight endless hordes of undead ! If your character is weaker (Less), you get more points per kill (More).

WASD or Arrows to move. Point and Click to attack.

Piervers & Pallefuury
